citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30-1:00
p.m. on 12/08/2014.
Inspector called the licensee and left a voice message but did not receive a return call while waiting on site.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30-1:00
p.m. on 12/08/2014.
Inspector called the licensee and left a voice message but did not receive a return call while waiting on site.
